title: Harnessing the electronic health record to identify and enroll people with epilepsy into a self-management program: Implementation and scalability in a clinical setting

abstract: Rationale “Self-management for people with epilepsy and a history of negative health events”(SMART) is an 8-week, remotely delivered, Epilepsy Self-Management (ESM) program. The ongoing EXPANDing self-management support in healthcare …
